member.summary: Category used to label entries that contain email list extension data.

member.name: M:Google.GData.Apps.EmailListEntry.Update
member.summary: Overrides the base Update() method to throw a ClientFeedException, because email list entries cannot be updated. This exception indicates that the client made an erroneous request to the email list feed.

member.name: P:Google.GData.Apps.EmailListEntry.EmailList
member.summary: The email list element in this entry.

member.name: T:Google.GData.Apps.AppsException
member.summary: The AppsException class defines an error resulting from a Google Apps provisioning request.

member.name: F:Google.GData.Apps.AppsException.UnknownError
member.summary: Google Apps error indicating that the request failed for an unknown reason.

member.name: F:Google.GData.Apps.AppsException.UserDeletedRecently
member.summary: Google Apps error indicating that the request instructs Google to create a new user but uses the username of an account that was deleted in the previous five days.

member.name: F:Google.GData.Apps.AppsException.UserSuspended
member.summary: Google Apps error indicating that the user identified in the request is suspended.

member.name: F:Google.GData.Apps.AppsException.DomainUserLimitExceeded
member.summary: Google Apps error indicating that the specified domain has already reached its quota of user accounts.

member.name: F:Google.GData.Apps.AppsException.DomainAliasLimitExceeded
member.summary: Google Apps error indicating that the specified domain has already reached its quota of aliases. Aliases include nicknames and email lists.

member.name: F:Google.GData.Apps.AppsException.DomainSuspended
member.summary: Google Apps error indicating that Google has suspended the specified domain's access to Google Apps.

member.name: F:Google.GData.Apps.AppsException.DomainFeatureUnavailable
member.summary: Google Apps error indicating that a particular feature is not available for the domain.

member.name: F:Google.GData.Apps.AppsException.EntityExists
member.summary: Google Apps error indicating that the request instructs Google to create an entity that already exists.

member.name: F:Google.GData.Apps.AppsException.EntityDoesNotExist
member.summary: Google Apps error indicating that the request asks Google to retrieve an entity that does not exist.

member.name: F:Google.GData.Apps.AppsException.EntityNameIsReserved
member.summary: Google Apps error indicating that the request instructs Google to create an entity with a reserved name, such as "abuse" or "postmaster".

member.name: F:Google.GData.Apps.AppsException.EntityNameNotValid
member.summary: Google Apps error indicating that the request provides an invalid name for a requested resource.

member.name: F:Google.GData.Apps.AppsException.InvalidGivenName
member.summary: Google Apps error indicating that the value in the API request for the user's first name, or given name, contains unaccepted characters.

member.name: F:Google.GData.Apps.AppsException.InvalidFamilyName
member.summary: Google Apps error indicating that the value in the API request for the user's surname, or family name, contains unaccepted characters.

member.name: F:Google.GData.Apps.AppsException.InvalidPassword
member.summary: Google Apps error indicating that the value in the API request for the user's password contains an invalid number of characters or unaccepted characters.

member.name: F:Google.GData.Apps.AppsException.InvalidUsername
member.summary: Google Apps error indicating that the value in the API request for the user's username contains unaccepted characters.

member.name: F:Google.GData.Apps.AppsException.InvalidHashFunctionName
member.summary: Google Apps error indicating that the specified password hash function name is not supported.

member.name: F:Google.GData.Apps.AppsException.InvalidHashDigestLength
member.summary: Google Apps error indicating that the password specified does not comply with the hash function specified.

member.name: F:Google.GData.Apps.AppsException.InvalidEmailAddress
member.summary: Google Apps error indicating that the email address specified is not valid.

member.name: F:Google.GData.Apps.AppsException.InvalidQueryParameterValue
member.summary: Google Apps error indicating that the query parameter value specified is not valid.

member.name: F:Google.GData.Apps.AppsException.TooManyRecipientsOnEmailList
member.summary: Google Apps error indicating that the request instructs Google to add users to an email list, but that list has already reached the maximum number of subscribers.

member.name: M:Google.GData.Apps.AppsException.#ctor
member.summary: Constructs a new AppsException with no properties set.

member.name: M:Google.GData.Apps.AppsException.#ctor(Google.GData.Client.GDataRequestException)
member.summary: Constructs a new AppsException to be parsed from the specified GDataRequestException.

member.name: M:Google.GData.Apps.AppsException.#ctor(System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Constructs a new AppsException with the specified properties.
member.param: the value of the ErrorCode property
the value of the InvalidInput property
the value of the Reason property

member.name: M:Google.GData.Apps.AppsException.ParseAppsException(Google.GData.Client.GDataRequestException)
member.summary: Parses a GDataRequestException, which wraps the HTTP error responses, into an AppsException.
member.param: the GDataRequestException to parse
member.returns: a new AppsException object. The object's ErrorCode, InvalidInput and Reason properties will be set if the XML in the HTTP response could be parsed, or null otherwise.

member.name: P:Google.GData.Apps.AppsException.ErrorCode
member.summary: Accessor for ErrorCode. This property specifies the type of error that caused an API request to fail.

member.name: P:Google.GData.Apps.AppsException.InvalidInput
member.summary: Accessor for InvalidInput. This property contains the data that caused an API response to fail; it may not be provided for all error types.

member.name: P:Google.GData.Apps.AppsException.Reason
member.summary: Accessor for Reason. This property contains a short explanation of the error that occurred.

member.name: T:Google.GData.Apps.NicknameQuery
member.summary:
A subclass of FeedQuery to query a Google Apps nickname feed URI.
Provides public properties that describe the different aspects of the URI, as well as a composite URI.

member.name: M:Google.GData.Apps.NicknameQuery.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary:
Constructs a new NicknameQuery to retrieve all nicknames in the specified domain.
In addition to calling the constructor, you may set at most one of Nickname, StartNickname or UserName to restrict your query.
member.param: the domain to query

member.name: M:Google.GData.Apps.NicknameQuery.CalculateQuery
member.summary: Creates the URI query string based on all set properties.

member.name: P:Google.GData.Apps.NicknameQuery.Domain
member.summary: Accessor method for Domain.

member.name: P:Google.GData.Apps.NicknameQuery.StartNickname
member.summary: Accessor method for StartNickname. If this property is non-null, the query will return a feed of up to 100 nicknames beginning with StartNickname.

member.name: P:Google.GData.Apps.NicknameQuery.Nickname
member.summary: Accessor method for Nickname. If this property is non-null, the query will retrieve the specified nickname.

member.name: P:Google.GData.Apps.NicknameQuery.UserName
member.summary: Accessor method for UserName. If this property is non-null, the query will retrieve all nicknames for the specified user.

member.name: P:Google.GData.Apps.NicknameQuery.RetrieveAllNicknames
member.summary: Accessor method for RetrieveAllNicknames. If false, the query returns at most 100 matches; if it is true (default), all matches are returned.

member.name: T:Google.GData.Apps.EmailListQuery
member.summary:
A subclass of FeedQuery to query a Google Apps email list feed URI.
Provides public properties that describe the different aspects of the URI, as well as a composite URI.

member.summary:
Constructs a new EmailListQuery to retrieve all email lists in the specified domain.
In addition to calling the constructor, you may set either Recipient or EmailListName (but not both) to restrict your query.

member.summary: Creates the URI query string based on all set properties.

member.name: P:Google.GData.Apps.EmailListQuery.EmailListName
member.summary: Accessor method for EmailListName. If this property is non-null, the query will retrieve only the specified email list.

member.name: P:Google.GData.Apps.EmailListQuery.StartEmailListName
member.summary: Accessor method for StartEmailListName. If this property is non-null, the query will retrieve a page of at most 100 email lists, starting with the specified email list.

member.name: P:Google.GData.Apps.EmailListQuery.RetrieveAllEmailLists
member.summary: Accessor method for RetrieveAllEmailLists. If false, the query returns at most 100 matches; if it is true (default), all matches are returned.

member.name: T:Google.GData.Apps.UserQuery
member.summary:
A subclass of FeedQuery to query a Google Apps user accounts feed URI.

member.summary: Constructs a new UserQuery to retrieve all users in the specified domain.
member.param: the domain to access

member.name: M:Google.GData.Apps.UserQuery.#ctor(System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Constructs a new UserQuery to retrieve users in the specified domain. Use this constructor if you only wish to retrieve the first 100 users, instead of the entire list.
member.param: the domain to access
true to retrieve all matches, false to return a maximum of 100 users

member.name: M:Google.GData.Apps.UserQuery.CalculateQuery
member.summary: Creates the URI query string based on all set properties.

member.name: P:Google.GData.Apps.UserQuery.Domain
member.summary: Accessor method for Domain.

member.name: P:Google.GData.Apps.UserQuery.StartUserName
member.summary: Accessor method for StartUserName. If set, the query will return a feed of at most 100 users beginning at this username.

member.name: P:Google.GData.Apps.UserQuery.UserName
member.summary: Accessor method for UserName. If set, this query will return a feed containing only the specified user. If both UserName and StartUserName are null, the query returns the feed of all users in the domain.

member.name: P:Google.GData.Apps.UserQuery.RetrieveAllUsers
member.summary: Accessor method for RetrieveAllUsers. If false, the query returns at most 100 matches; if it is true (default), all matches are returned.
